TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ServiceDescription extends System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem
Public NotInheritable Class ServiceDescription Inherits DocumentableItem
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ServiceDescription extends System.Web.Services.Description.NamedItem
Public NotInheritable Class ServiceDescription Inherits NamedItem
.class public auto ansi sealed ServiceDescription extends System.Web.Services.Description.NamedItem

Docs.summary: Provides a means of creating and formatting a valid Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document file, complete with appropriate namespaces, elements, and attributes, for describing an XML Web service. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Instances of this class can be created with either the `new` keyword or the static <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%2A> method, which parses a WSDL file and assigns its values to appropriate members of the class.
WSDL is an XML-based language for describing XML Web services. The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> class corresponds to the root element, `definitions`, of a WSDL file. For more information about WSDL, see the [WSDL](https://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/) specification.
## Examples The following example shows how to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> class.
:::code language="cpp" source="~/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescription/CPP/servicedescription.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/snippets/csharp/System.Web.Services.Description/ServiceDescription/Overview/servicedescription.cs" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescription/VB/servicedescription.vb" id="Snippet1":::

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Serializer As XmlSerializer
public: static property System::Xml::Serialization::XmlSerializer ^ Serializer { System::Xml::Serialization::XmlSerializer ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the XML serializer used to serialize and deserialize between a object and a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
Docs.value: The XML serializer used to serialize and deserialize between a object and a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The XML serializer can be customized using classes derived from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension> class. These classes are specified in a configuration file using the `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` element and its child `add` element. The configuration can be applied to an ASP.NET Web application that publishes a Web service.
